about_the_game:
Dive into a unique adventure on the trail of the Etherians, a vanished civilization whose technologies seem to attract many people with dubious intentions... Get your hands on these technologies before they use them to wreak havoc across the galaxy.

In this first-person exploration and survival game, many challenges await you!

Explore planets


Your quest will take you to many different planets and environments to unlock the secrets of Etherian technology. Explore ancient caves, enter a working industrial complex and experience unique adventures!

Collect resources


Collect resources on your expeditions and automate their processing with various machines that you unlock as you progress. But be careful: make sure your base has enough energy to run them all!

Build your base


Build your own base to make yourself at home, and develop new technologies to improve your equipment for further exploration.

Many dangers await you


During your expeditions, you're likely to encounter unexpected and hostile encounters: toxic gases, wild creatures, bounty hunters and security services; you'll have to build your own weapons to defeat them and advance your quest.

name: Space Crafter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Go on an adventure in the footsteps of an ancient civilisation. Explore hostile planets, build your base and acquire the technologies of the past before they are turned to create chaos.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
